mapper.select: SELECT c.license_name FROM tb_officer AS o INNER JOIN tb_officer_license AS l INNER JOIN tb_license AS c ON o.officer_id = l.officer_id AND l.license_code = c.license_code WHERE o.officer_id = #{SID}

SELECT O.officer_id ,O.officer_pw ,O.officer_name ,O.officer_birth ,V.level_name ,B.library_name ,O.officer_address ,O.officer_tel ,O.officer_email ,O.officer_reg_date ,C.career_name
FROM tb_officer AS O INNER JOIN tb_career AS C INNER JOIN tb_level AS V INNER JOIN tb_library AS B ON O.officer_id=C.officer_id AND O.level_code = V.level_code AND B.library_code = O.library_code WHERE O.officer_id = #{SID}

SELECT o.officer_id ,o.officer_pw ,o.officer_name ,o.officer_birth ,v.level_name ,l.library_name ,o.officer_address ,o.officer_tel ,o.officer_email ,o.officer_reg_date FROM tb_officer AS o INNER JOIN tb_library AS l INNER JOIN tb_level AS v ON o.library_code = l.library_code AND o.level_code = v.level_code
WHERE ${sk} like CONCAT('%',#{sv},'%')

SELECT o.officer_id ,o.officer_pw ,o.officer_name ,o.officer_birth ,v.level_name ,l.library_name ,o.officer_address ,o.officer_tel ,o.officer_email ,o.officer_reg_date FROM tb_officer AS o INNER JOIN tb_library AS l INNER JOIN tb_level AS v ON o.library_code = l.library_code AND o.level_code = v.level_code

SELECT (case when COUNT(*) = 0 then 'officer_01' when COUNT(*) < 9 then CONCAT('officer_0',(max(SUBSTRING(officer_id,9))+1)) when COUNT(*) < 100 then CONCAT('officer_',(max(SUBSTRING(officer_id,9))+1)) ELSE CONCAT('officer_',(max(SUBSTRING(officer_id,9))+1)) END) AS officer_id FROM tb_officer
